00024 #ifndef __GHOST_NDOFMANAGER_H__
00025 #define __GHOST_NDOFMANAGER_H__
00026 
00027 #include "GHOST_System.h"
00028 
00029 
00030 // #define DEBUG_NDOF_MOTION
00031 // #define DEBUG_NDOF_BUTTONS
00032 
00033 typedef enum {
00034     NDOF_UnknownDevice,
00035 
00036     // current devices
00037     NDOF_SpaceNavigator,
00038     NDOF_SpaceExplorer,
00039     NDOF_SpacePilotPro,
00040     NDOF_SpaceMousePro,
00041 
00042     // older devices
00043     NDOF_SpacePilot,
00044     NDOF_Spaceball5000,
00045     NDOF_SpaceTraveler
00046 
00047     } NDOF_DeviceT;
00048 
00049 // NDOF device button event types
00050 typedef enum {
00051     // used internally, never sent
00052     NDOF_BUTTON_NONE,
00053     // these two are available from any 3Dconnexion device
00054     NDOF_BUTTON_MENU,
00055     NDOF_BUTTON_FIT,
00056     // standard views
00057     NDOF_BUTTON_TOP,
00058     NDOF_BUTTON_BOTTOM,
00059     NDOF_BUTTON_LEFT,
00060     NDOF_BUTTON_RIGHT,
00061     NDOF_BUTTON_FRONT,
00062     NDOF_BUTTON_BACK,
00063     // more views
00064     NDOF_BUTTON_ISO1,
00065     NDOF_BUTTON_ISO2,
00066     // 90 degree rotations
00067     // these don't all correspond to physical buttons
00068     NDOF_BUTTON_ROLL_CW,
00069     NDOF_BUTTON_ROLL_CCW,
00070     NDOF_BUTTON_SPIN_CW,
00071     NDOF_BUTTON_SPIN_CCW,
00072     NDOF_BUTTON_TILT_CW,
00073     NDOF_BUTTON_TILT_CCW,
00074     // device control
00075     NDOF_BUTTON_ROTATE,
00076     NDOF_BUTTON_PANZOOM,
00077     NDOF_BUTTON_DOMINANT,
00078     NDOF_BUTTON_PLUS,
00079     NDOF_BUTTON_MINUS,
00080     // keyboard emulation
00081     NDOF_BUTTON_ESC,
00082     NDOF_BUTTON_ALT,
00083     NDOF_BUTTON_SHIFT,
00084     NDOF_BUTTON_CTRL,
00085     // general-purpose buttons
00086     // users can assign functions via keymap editor
00087     NDOF_BUTTON_1,
00088     NDOF_BUTTON_2,
00089     NDOF_BUTTON_3,
00090     NDOF_BUTTON_4,
00091     NDOF_BUTTON_5,
00092     NDOF_BUTTON_6,
00093     NDOF_BUTTON_7,
00094     NDOF_BUTTON_8,
00095     NDOF_BUTTON_9,
00096     NDOF_BUTTON_10,
00097     // more general-purpose buttons
00098     NDOF_BUTTON_A,
00099     NDOF_BUTTON_B,
00100     NDOF_BUTTON_C,
00101     // the end
00102     NDOF_BUTTON_LAST
00103     } NDOF_ButtonT;
00104 
00105 class GHOST_NDOFManager
00106 {
00107 public:
00108     GHOST_NDOFManager(GHOST_System&);
00109 
00110     virtual ~GHOST_NDOFManager() {};
00111 
00112     // whether multi-axis functionality is available (via the OS or driver)
00113     // does not imply that a device is plugged in or being used
00114     virtual bool available() = 0;
00115 
00116     // each platform's device detection should call this
00117     // use standard USB/HID identifiers
00118     bool setDevice(unsigned short vendor_id, unsigned short product_id);
00119 
00120     // filter out small/accidental/uncalibrated motions by
00121     // setting up a "dead zone" around home position
00122     // set to 0 to disable
00123     // 0.1 is a safe and reasonable value
00124     void setDeadZone(float);
00125 
00126     // the latest raw axis data from the device
00127     // NOTE: axis data should be in blender view coordinates
00128     //       +X is to the right
00129     //       +Y is up
00130     //       +Z is out of the screen
00131     //       for rotations, look from origin to each +axis
00132     //       rotations are + when CCW, - when CW
00133     // each platform is responsible for getting axis data into this form
00134     // these values should not be scaled (just shuffled or flipped)
00135     void updateTranslation(short t[3], GHOST_TUns64 time);
00136     void updateRotation(short r[3], GHOST_TUns64 time);
00137 
00138     // the latest raw button data from the device
00139     // use HID button encoding (not NDOF_ButtonT)
00140     void updateButton(int button_number, bool press, GHOST_TUns64 time);
00141     void updateButtons(int button_bits, GHOST_TUns64 time);
00142     // NDOFButton events are sent immediately
00143 
00144     // processes and sends most recent raw data as an NDOFMotion event
00145     // returns whether an event was sent
00146     bool sendMotionEvent();
00147 
00148 protected:
00149     GHOST_System& m_system;
00150 
00151 private:
00152     void sendButtonEvent(NDOF_ButtonT, bool press, GHOST_TUns64 time, GHOST_IWindow*);
00153     void sendKeyEvent(GHOST_TKey, bool press, GHOST_TUns64 time, GHOST_IWindow*);
00154 
00155     NDOF_DeviceT m_deviceType;
00156     int m_buttonCount;
00157     int m_buttonMask;
00158     const NDOF_ButtonT* m_hidMap;
00159 
00160     short m_translation[3];
00161     short m_rotation[3];
00162     int m_buttons; // bit field
00163 
00164     GHOST_TUns64 m_motionTime; // in milliseconds
00165     GHOST_TUns64 m_prevMotionTime; // time of most recent Motion event sent
00166 
00167     GHOST_TProgress m_motionState;
00168     bool m_motionEventPending;
00169     float m_deadZone; // discard motion with each component < this
00170 };
00171 
00172 #endif
